headline: 3 Reasons CHRW is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since January 2025, C.H. Robinson Worldwide has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 3% while floating around $98.71. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 6.9% gain during that period.
